4f9ec9d2-67f0-4f99-94eb-655fbda7e623.description: The earner of this badge has developed practical skills in working within the foreign direct investment space. The earner can: identify the importance of various types of FDI; create clear and actionable value propositions; implement various FDI attraction strategies; conduct pre-qualification and eligibility checks against potential investors; leverage professional social media platforms to network within the investment sphere; work with remote teams to strengthen Australia's FDI opportunities
4f9ec9d2-67f0-4f99-94eb-655fbda7e623.name: Investment Advisory

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a 8 week, virtually delivered course.
Can identify high potential investors and conduct pre-qualification checks.
Can conduct pre-qualification checks for potential investors.
Tailor value propositions for specific clients.
Make compelling cases to investors by showing them the benefits of working with government.
Use reporting to measure success, including how the market benefits and how partners contribute to it.

7e864443-7961-4203-af52-13393591742f.description: Earners of the IPWEA Professional Certificate in Asset Management Planning have acquired a comprehensive understanding of asset management planning. They are able to select, collate, edit and report on asset management data, and develop a comprehensive Asset Management Plan (one asset class). They can communicate the impacts of levels of service and risk associated with a planned budget and long-term financial plan, and develop demand management options and priorities for capital works.
7e864443-7961-4203-af52-13393591742f.name: Professional Certificate in Asset Management Planning

alignments.name: ISO 55000
alignments.description: ISO 55000:2014 provides an overview of asset management, its principles and terminology, and the expected benefits from adopting asset management.

alignments.name: International Infrastructure Management Manual (IIMM)
alignments.description: The International Infrastructure Management Manual (IIMM) has been driven largely by the updates to the ISO 55000 Asset Management Standards. The Manual process provides valuable learnings for those who have a vital stewardship role in managing the investment in infrastructure on behalf of their community, customers or investors.

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the formal requirements of the course to a satisfactory level.
Successfully completed a formal assessment involving the development of an Asset Management Plan.
Earning the Professional Certificate in Asset Management Planning.

957fd315-8d7c-43fb-b4d3-0e36b0496bf1.description: The earner of this badge has developed skills in communicating across cultures. The earner explored Austrades core values, as well gained an understanding of Austrade's journey as an organisation. The earner can: demonstrate an ability to foster and maintain trust in collaboration across cultures and modify communication style to be appropriate when working with people from different cultures.
957fd315-8d7c-43fb-b4d3-0e36b0496bf1.name: Austrade Experience

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed 4-week learning experience focused on developing skills in communicating across cultures, including delivering a presentation on communing effectively within a particular country.

6e40e60f-366d-4673-a8bc-176ebf7b78ca.description: The earner of this badge will have completed IntelliHQ’s Clinicians and Researchers training as part of the AI in Healthcare program. This course introduces participants to big data capture analytics and AI in healthcare to empower healthcare leaders, clinicians, nurses, and research scientists to confidently engage with these tools to improve their workflow and patient outcomes. The course content was developed by the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and the Gradient Institute.
6e40e60f-366d-4673-a8bc-176ebf7b78ca.name: IntelliHQ Collaborative Data Science for Healthcare

Addressed challenges in health data science
Worked in data preparation & pre-processing
Australian regulation and policies on AI in health and research
Ethical implementation of AI
Fairness and algorithm disparity and bias
Sensitivity Analysis and Model Validation

The course includes a team challenge providing an opportunity for teams to work together and bring about positive change at Aspen.
